prompts: Create a psychic-type Pokemon with a sleek design and a powerful aura.
Show me a legendary creature with unique abilities and a mysterious past.
Imagine a bipedal Pokemon that excels in telekinetic combat and has a regal appearance.
Design a Pokemon that embodies intelligence and strength, with a striking color palette.
Generate a mythical Pokemon that has a deep connection to psychic energy and the cosmos.
Make a powerful Pokemon that appears wise and intimidating, perfect for a battle.
Give me a Pokemon that stands out with its unique features and psychic prowess.
